title: Why Thanksgiving Turkeys Will Cost More This Year
description: With avian flu, inflation and supply-chain challenges, this could be a rough year for getting just the bird you want.
dc:creator: Kim Severson
media:credit: Kaiti Sullivan for The New York Times
media:description: Broad-breasted white turkeys live on 20 acres designated for them at Gunthorp Farms in LaGrange, Ind.
